title: Live Updates: Iran Launches Missiles at Israel, Israeli Military Says

title: As Crisis Builds, Lebanon’s Government Is Nowhere to Be Found
content: Already crippled by years of economic decline, political paralysis and other crises, Lebanon has little but its own citizens’ grit to survive the Israel-Hezbollah conflict.

title: In Ukraine, a Long Battle for Vuhledar Nears a Sudden End
